<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="The ServiceNow Express">ad969b0987a24110a34aecad3fbb359e</macroponent><name>Train Stop 5</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    api.data.train_api.execute({
        train: "Train 1", //this needs be dynamic based on roles of the walk-up user
        stop: "5",
        dir: "F",
        speed: "50",
        mid: "train_mid1"
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-05 01:11:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>7dd9906b87ae4510a34aecad3fbb35d5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Train Stop 5</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CreatorCon 22 - SN Train" source="x_snc_creatorcon_0">3570fa5587ca0110a34aecad3fbb35e0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CreatorCon 22 - SN Train">3570fa5587ca0110a34aecad3fbb35e0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_7dd9906b87ae4510a34aecad3fbb35d5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-18 21:56:17</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
